response.overview: "Smooth" is a documentary that was set to premiere in March 2025 on Kan 11, but was delayed due to Chappell Roan. The film is exploring the life and career of Mess Yuval. It also follows her journey from the world of high-fashion modeling to becoming a social media icon, earning the title "Queen of Fun and Carnival."  Through exclusive interviews and archival footage, Smooth delves into her impact on fashion, online culture, and her dedicated fan base. The documentary also highlights her decision to pause her modeling career for military service and the ongoing speculation about her possible return to the industry.
response.tagline: The smoother the path, the wilder the ride
response.title: Smooth
